hero.title: Chelyabinskgorgaz
hero.description: Digital Personal Cabinet for Gas Distribution Services
hero.tagline: Comprehensive mobile application serving over 58,000 users across Chelyabinsk region, digitizing gas infrastructure services from appointments to payments for two major Gazprom subsidiaries.

overview.title: Project Overview
overview.description: Chelyabinskgorgaz represents the digital transformation of regional gas infrastructure services. As the React Native developer, I built a comprehensive government services platform that serves hundreds of thousands of residents across Chelyabinsk region.

challenge.title: Public Service Challenges
challenge.description: Traditional gas infrastructure services required physical visits, manual paperwork, and complex bureaucratic processes. Citizens needed efficient digital access to essential utility services without compromising security and compliance.

problems.title: Manual Service Processes
problems.description: Time-consuming physical visits for routine gas service requests

problems.title: Limited Service Hours
problems.description: Restricted access to services during business hours only

problems.title: Complex Documentation
problems.description: Extensive paperwork and bureaucratic procedures for gas connections

problems.title: Payment Inconvenience
problems.description: Limited payment options and manual billing processes

solution.title: Digital Government Solution
solution.description: I developed a comprehensive React Native application that revolutionizes gas infrastructure services through digital transformation, providing 24/7 access to over 20 unified service types for regional residents.

features.title: Comprehensive Service Portal
features.description: Over 20 types of unified applications available online, from gas connections to contract management.

features.title: Digital Identity & Security
features.description: Verified user system ensuring secure access to personal accounts and sensitive utility information.

features.title: Meter Management System
features.description: Complete meter installation requests, readings submission, and consumption tracking capabilities.

features.title: Integrated Payment Platform
features.description: Secure payment processing for gas services with multiple payment methods and receipt management.

technical.title: Technical Implementation
technical.description: Built with government-grade security and reliability standards
